summary: My first attempt at a new landmass for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
SINCE I AM NOT WORKING ON THIS ANY LONGER I GIVE EVERYONE PERMISSION TO USE THIS FILE. just give credit to me when you post it.

This is my first attempt at a new landmass for Skyrim.

Later on in this mod I will want to add quests, so if anyone would be willing to do some quests for me I would be very appreciative for the help.

Also, I would like to make the Arena I made into a fully functioning arena like in Oblivion. So if anyone is willing to do that, or show me how to do it I would be grateful.

To get to the Island you must:
go to the solitude docks
head toward the light house
on your way there there you should see a single ship with a little dock next to it.
OR
type in coc cityint1 exit the house and you will be on the island.

============================================================================
Version 1
This is just for you to get a feel for what this mod is going to be. 

============================================================================
Version 2
Finished exterior of the Arena.
Added a few more house interiors.
Added a small arena with two trolls(4000 hp each) for testing overpowered weapons.
============================================================================

I will make interiors for all of the building eventually.
Any ideas for an Island name would be helpfull as I do not plan to just keep the name as \"The Island\" forever.
author: poptart11
